properties.resumecontent:
KOLLURU KRISHNA MOULI
+91 9177732023 ⋄kollurukrishnamouli@gmail.com
LinkedIn GitHub
INTRODUCTION
Software Engineer with Industry experience in Full-Stack Gen-AI and web development with AI/ML.
EDUCATION
Bachelor of Computer Science and Engineering ,
Swami Vivekananda Institute of Technology, JNTU Hyderabad 2018 - 2022
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Full Stack GenAI/Web Developer Jan 2023 - Present
Sonata Software Limited Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
•Played a key role in the development and launch of Harmoni.AI , Sonata Software’s responsible-first GenAI product,
contributing from its inception.
•Built an internal HR Policy Bot using .NET Azure Functions, Azure Bot Framework, and React.js, which provided
employees with rapid access to internal policy information, enhancing HR query resolution speed.
•Developed a novel content extraction algorithm using Azure Document Intelligence , converting documents into
searchable strings for effective Q&A. Created a re-ranking algorithm, improving response accuracy by 80% .
•Designed and implemented an interactive dashboard for monitoring bot performance, displaying key metrics such as the
number of requests, response times, and user feedback (positive and negative).
•Developed an ITSM Bot for automating IT support queries, including ticket creation for unresolved issues and assisting
support agents in quickly extracting answers from past tickets. Introduced a self-service feature for agents to generate
and upload Technical Solution Guides (TSGs) using AI.
•Migrated the entire Harmoni.AI codebase from .NET to Python inAzure Functions andFlask , enabling the integra-
tion of Python AI libraries like LangChain and other advanced tools, enhancing the system’s AI capabilities.
•Created a multi-skill bot for a client, leveraging OpenAI tool calling to handle various tasks such as answering questions,
booking meetings and conference rooms, and raising support tickets. Designed the architecture to be easily scalable for
future capability additions.
•Worked with Advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) ,Prompt Engineering , and Model Fine-
Tuning to enhance the accuracy and responsiveness of AI-driven solutions.
•Developed proposals for clients, including:
– Pharma Client : Devised a comprehensive solution to migrate their existing search platform to a new, scalable
model using AWS services. Prepared functional and technical workflows, effort estimates, and commercial plans.
– Research Assistant Bot : Designed a memory module for maintaining bot memory and created a framework to
measure and improve response accuracy, optimizing researchers’ efficiency.
SKILLS
•Technical:
– Programming Languages: Python, C#, JavaScript
– Gen-AI Frameworks: LangChain (Lang-Graph, Lang-Smith), LlamaIndex, Semantic Kernel
– Gen-AI Services/Tools: Azure AI studio and services, Microsoft Co-pilot, AWS Bedrock and Sagemaker, Goolge
Vertex AI
– Web Frameworks: Azure Functions, Flask, dJango, Fast-API, AWS Lambda, .NET Web API
– Web Front-End Technologies: ReactJS, MaterialUI, TailWindCSS
– Databases: MongoDB, CosmosDB, Azure Tables, MySQL, DynamoDB
– Cloud Storage Services: Azure Storage (Tables, Queues, Blobs), S3-Bucket, AWS Queue
– Authentication: Microsoft Entra ID, Amazon Cogito, Okta
– Miscellaneous: VS Code, MS Visual Studio, GIT, Power Shell, Linux, Bash
•Business: Proposal Creation, Market Research, Pitch Deck Creation
•Soft: Communication, Team Leadership, Problem Solving
PROFESSIONAL CERTIFICATIONS
•Microsoft Issued
–AI-900 Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Fundamentals[ref]AI/ML
–AI-102 Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate[ref]AI/Azure AI Services
–DP-100 Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate[ref]AI/ML/Data-Science
–DP-600 Microsoft Certified: Fabric Analytics Engineer Associate[ref]Azure Data Pipelines/Processing
–AZ-204 Microsoft Certified: Azure Developer Associate[ref]Azure Cloud Infra/Development–AZ-400 Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions[ref]Azure DevOps
•Goolge Issued
–Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate[1] [2] [3] [4] [5] [6] [7]AI/ML/Data-Science
•Oracle Issued
–Oracle Database Design[ref]Data-Base Management
–Oracle DataBase Programming with SQL[ref]Data-Base Management
PROJECTS
Azure-Based Agent Nexus Solution[ref]September 2024
Developed a versatile, Azure-based framework for seamless interaction and skill management using the Agent Nexus Interface
and Skill Catalogue Interface. Key components included Azure Functions, Blob Storage, SharePoint, and LLMs to provide
dynamic skill management capabilities.
•Built an Agent Nexus Interface powered by LLMs and an orchestrator to manage interactions, memory, and data
sources effectively.
•Created a Skill Catalogue allowing users to explore, add, and manage intelligent skills, enhancing business operations
through a graphical interface.
•Integrated Responsible AI guardrails (e.g., PII detection, content moderation) to ensure data safety and compliance
with privacy regulations.
•Developed use cases for automating IT support tasks and dynamic skill creation.
Patron-Procuration-Target-Prognosis: A Deep Learning Solution[ref]June 2020
Built a deep learning framework for predicting user intentions on e-commerce platforms to bridge online and physical store
experiences.
•Developed a model analyzing website navigation, content, and simplicity to predict user intent and purchase likelihood.
•Provided e-commerce companies with actionable insights for improving website optimization and conversion rates.
GNN-Based Software Development Effort Estimation[ref]January 2022
Designed a framework using Graph Neural Networks (GNN) to enhance software cost estimation accuracy in a dynamic
industry.
•Implemented GNN to predict development effort by analyzing project size, complexity, and team structure.
•Demonstrated improved estimation accuracy compared to traditional models, aiding in resource allocation and cost
control.
LECTURES
Programming for Industry - SVIT, Telangana[ref]October 2022
Delivered a comprehensive lecture on programming practices relevant to the industry, focusing on practical applications and
real-world problem-solving.
Programming with Python - SVIT, Telangana[ref]Dec 2022
Presented an in-depth lecture covering Python programming fundamentals, advanced features, and its use in data analysis
and automation.
MongoDB Essentials - Rajalakshmi Engg College, Chennai[ref]Sep 2024
Conducted a lecture on MongoDB, exploring its architecture, querying, indexing, and its application in modern web develop-
ment.
PUBLICATIONS
“Supply Chain Management: An Innovative Application of Edge Computing”[ref]ICIHPE 2020, ICE, Tamil
Nadu
Published in the proceedings of the International Conference on Innovations in Higher Education (ICIHPE) 2020, Tamil Nadu.
This paper explores the integration of edge computing in supply chain management to enhance efficiency and decision-making
processes.
“Graph Neural Networks for AI-Driven Insights”[ref]AI Conference, 2022
Presented findings at an AI conference, discussing the use of Graph Neural Networks (GNN) for advanced data analysis and
prediction models. The presentation covered key insights into how GNN can be leveraged for improved decision-making in
complex systems.
INTERESTS
•Enjoy solving puzzles and writing articles on LinkedIn, focusing mainly on technology.
•Passionate about singing Carnatic music, participating in cultural events and performances.
properties.resumesummary: Kolluru Krishna Mouli is a Software Engineer with industry experience in Full-Stack Gen-AI and web development with AI/ML. He holds a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Swami Vivekananda Institute of Technology, JNTU Hyderabad (2018-2022). Currently, he works as a Full Stack GenAI/Web Developer at Sonata Software Limited in Bengaluru, Karnataka, India, where he has contributed to various projects including the development of Harmoni.AI, an internal HR Policy Bot, and an ITSM Bot. His skills include programming languages like Python, C#, and JavaScript, Gen-AI frameworks, web frameworks, databases, and cloud storage services. He holds multiple certifications from Microsoft, Google, and Oracle. His interests include solving puzzles, writing articles on LinkedIn, and singing Carnatic music.
